Document:
# Service Department SOP These are the list of SOPs that Service Personnel should follow. These are, as stated before, [bold]not checklists[/bold] and should be treated as guidelines.
Furthermore, these listings do not necessarily coincide with one another, and are separated by Job unless otherwise stated.
The following jobs have entries in this Department, the [color=#1b67a5][bold]Head of Personnel[/bold][/color] being the Head of Staff: - [textlink="Head of Personnel" link="HeadOfPersonnelSOP"] - [textlink="Bartender" link="BartenderSOP"] - [textlink="Botanist" link="BotanistSOP"] - [textlink="Chef" link="ChefSOP"] - [textlink="Clown" link="ClownSOP"] - [textlink="Janitor" link="JanitorSOP"] - [textlink="Librarian" link="LibrarianSOP"] - [textlink="Mime" link="MimeSOP"] - [textlink="Reporter" link="ReporterSOP"]
